examples.example: 我愿用一生的时间去追求自己的梦想，让生命绽放出绚丽的光彩。

translate.english: I am willing to use the whole life to pursue my own dream and let life bloom with brilliant glorious.

examples.example: 他决定用一生的精力去钻研那门学科，为科学事业贡献自己的力量。

translate.english: He decided to devote his whole life's energy to studying that discipline and contribute his strength to the cause of science.

examples.example: 我愿用一生的时光陪伴家人，共享生活的美好。

translate.english: I am willing to spend my whole life accompanying my family and sharing the beauty of life together.
